body_html:
Makes sense, thank you @carpodaster.

If I understood correctly then, it would be best for the team not to be confirmed until both a second student and at least one coach accept their invitations, correct?

body:
Makes sense, thank you @carpodaster. 

If I understood correctly then, it would be best for the team not to be `confirmed` until both a second student and at least one coach accept their invitations, correct?
